alert.note: Alert for Southern Twin Falls County; Western Magic Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 4:45PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Twin Falls and southwestern Jerome Counties through 530 PM MDT... At 445 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hollister, or 13 miles southwest of Twin Falls, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Twin Falls and Magic Valley Regional Airport around 500 PM MDT. Kimberly around 510 PM MDT. Hansen around 520 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Southern Twin Falls County; Western Magic Valley
